description: Submission of planning application under Section 73 to amend conditions 2 (approved drawings), 3 (phasing plan), 7 (residential units), 8 (non-residential floorspace) ad 52 (car parking provision) of outline planning permission 15/02039/OUT, as amended by 17/04670/VAR, to facilitate minor changes to residential unit numbers, building heights, development zones, non residential floorspace, landscaping and play provision and parking provision in relation to Phase 2A and 4 of the Alma Estate, Enfield, ENÂ£. Submission of Environmental Statement Addendum. Following submission of this application, subsequent amendments have been made. In summary, these comprise the following:- Reduction to 1,080 units in total (87 uplift above 993 outline), Phase 2 reconfigured internal layout and remains at 228 units. Phase 4 reduced to 75 units, Phase 4, reconfigured layout and height reduced by one storey to 5 (with setback retained). Tenure mix update and amended housing mix. (See attached letter)
